about.heading: OPENSCAN
about.subtitle: Trustless Blockchain Exploration
about.missionStatement: OpenScan is an open-source, lightweight blockchain explorer built to provide transparency and true openness. We connect directly to blockchain nodes, giving you unfettered access to on-chain data without intermediaries or centralized services.
about.freeOpenSourceDescription: 100% open source, publicly auditable, and free for all users. No vendor lock-in.
about.privacyFirstDescription: No advertising, no trackers, no user data harvesting. Your data stays yours.
about.trustlessByDesignDescription: Direct RPC connections to blockchain nodes. Verify data independently, no intermediaries.
about.publicInfrastructureDescription: Built as a public good for the decentralized ecosystem, sustained by ethical funding.
about.multiChainExplorerDescription: Explore blocks, transactions, and addresses across multiple EVM networks.
about.contractInteractionDescription: Read and write to verified smart contracts directly from the explorer.
about.localDevelopmentDescription: Full support for Hardhat and Anvil local networks with trace capabilities.
about.rpcTransparencyDescription: Compare responses across multiple RPC providers. Detect inconsistencies.
about.openSourceDescription: The entire codebase is publicly available and welcomes community contributions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with the OpenScan team
contact.xmtpDescription: We use XMTP for decentralized, wallet-to-wallet messaging. Send us a direct message using your Ethereum wallet - no email required, fully encrypted, and censorship resistant.
contact.walletMessagingDescription: XMTP enables messaging between Ethereum wallets. No account creation needed - just connect your wallet.
contact.endToEndDescription: All messages are encrypted. Only you and the recipient can read the conversation.
contact.decentralizedDescription: No central server controls your messages. The protocol is open and permissionless.
contact.interoperableDescription: Works across any app that supports XMTP - Converse, Coinbase Wallet, and more.
contact.alsoReachUs: You can also reach us on

subscriptions.title: Support OpenScan
subscriptions.subtitle: Sustainable, ethical funding for open-source blockchain infrastructure
subscriptions.valueProposition: OpenScan remains entirely free for all end-users. Revenue is sourced from projects, applications, tokens, and networks that recognize the value of the platform and wish to formally appear as verified supporters of the open ecosystem.
subscriptions.limitedTimeDiscounts: Limited time discounts on all subscriptions
subscriptions.roadmapDescription: Ally-tier subscribers gain voting power in our bi-annual roadmap planning sessions, where the OpenScan team and Allies collaborate to shape the future of the platform.
subscriptions.featurePrioritizationDescription: Vote on which features and improvements get developed next based on community needs.
subscriptions.networkExpansionDescription: Help decide which blockchain networks OpenScan should support and integrate.
subscriptions.strategicDirectionDescription: Participate in discussions about OpenScan's long-term vision and technical direction.
subscriptions.step1Description: Create a pull request to the explorer-metadata repository with your project information and subscription details.
subscriptions.step2Description: The OpenScan team will review your pull request to verify eligibility and ensure all required information is provided.
subscriptions.step3Description: Once your PR is approved, send the subscription payment on Ethereum Mainnet. Then use the OpenScan Devtools to sign the payment transaction hash and share it on your PR to prove ownership.
subscriptions.step4Description: After payment and signature verification, your PR will be merged and your subscription benefits will be activated immediately.
subscriptions.paymentAddressDescription: All subscription payments are sent directly to the OpenScan DAO address:
subscriptions.footerNote: All revenue is reinvested solely for the platform's continuous development, growth, and infrastructural improvement.

tokens.name: Tokens
tokens.description: Verified contracts tags, metadata integration, logo display, official links and token balance fetcher integration.

networks.name: Networks
networks.description: Full RPC methods support, dedicated technical maintenance, subdomain availability, and prominent branding.

apps.name: Crypto Apps
apps.description: Dedicated listing and verified branding for wallets, dApps, supplementary explorer tools, and exchanges, promoting integration and visibility.

companies.name: Companies & Orgs
companies.description: Formal recognition and visibility for infrastructure providers, venture funds, and other supporting entities who contribute to the project's continuity.
